DataElement.preferredName: Adjuvant Therapy Lapatinib Administered Agent End Date

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the administration of lapatinib in an adjuvant setting.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (AD-joo-vant) Treatment given after the primary treatment to increase the chances of a cure. Adjuvant therapy may include chemotherapy, radiation therapy, hormone therapy, or biological therapy.

Concepts.definition: Any therapy that is administered to augment or stimulate other treatment modalities or to minimize or prevent disease recurrence subsequent to the main treatment plan.

Property.preferredDefinition: The ditosylate salt of a synthetic, orally-active quinazoline with potential antineoplastic properties. Lapatinib reversibly blocks phosphorylation of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR), ErbB2, and the Erk-1 and-2 and AKT kinases; it also inhibits cyclin D protein levels in human tumor cell lines and xenografts. EGFR and ErbB2 have been implicated in the growth of various tumor types.:Given.

Concepts.definition: A synthetic, orally-active quinazoline with potential antineoplastic properties. Lapatinib reversibly blocks phosphorylation of the epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR), ErbB2, and the Erk-1 and-2 and AKT kinases; it also inhibits cyclin D protein levels in human tumor cell lines and xenografts. EGFR and ErbB2 have been implicated in the growth of various tumor types.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date when agent usage ended.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Time meaning: Like time, date, frequency, occurence,..etc

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
